description:
Shinatsuhiko Yuuhi is a Land God with great power, enough where http://anidb.net/ch3399 [Enjin] and his associates fear him, but it`s his sister http://anidb.net/ch3398 [Yae] who wields the title of Land Goddess of Sakurashin. He appears as a young boy, however he is really much older. He has been watching over Sakurashin for over 200 years and is the District Mayor.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shinatsuhiko Yuuhi
